articles.title: Radhakishan Damani and associates offload India Cements shares for ₹1,889 crore - CNBCTV18
articles.description: The country’s leading cement maker UltraTech acquired the entire block, which is considered to be a bid to expand its presence in the southern market.
articles.content: Billionaire investor Radhakishan Damani and his associates sold 23% equity in India Cements for 1,889 crore. The deal was executed at an average price of 267.74 per share on the BSE. The countrys lea… [+1797 chars]
